title: kalviyAl enna payanE
sahitya:
kalviyAl enna payanE jIva kAruNya nAthanaik-karudi urugAda


anupallavi

  shollilum sheyalilum shollarum sukhattilum tOindu tOind-anubhavam vAindu magizhAda


caraNam    Accup-pOccenradu kai aDukkinArk-kaviyAmO anbilAnEsamum Abattirkk-udavumO
pEccukku rAvaNan pinbu kumbhakarNanAip-pidaTrip-pozhudu pOkkum udaTTuk-kalaiyAna
